While the little pig still looks destined for the chop, clever spider Charlotte hatches a plan to use her web-spinning talents to save him. Family drama, starring Dakota Fanning and featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Dominic Scott Kay, Steve Buscemi and John Cleese(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Homer unwittingly pollutes Lake Springfield, so the US government decides to isolate the city underneath a giant dome. The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A disillusioned man learns his father was a member of a secret society of superpowered assassins dedicated to eliminating people who are destined to commit acts of evil in the future. Having inherited his father's special abilities, he is recruited into the organisation and must take on a former member who has betrayed it. Action adventure, starring James McAvoy, Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman

programme.title: Manson
programme.desc: Biopic of the cult leader, following the establishment of his `family' of followers in 1960s California. Manson exerts a powerful influence over the people who came to him, and fuelled by delusions of an inevitable coming race war, he ultimately compelled them to commit a series of brutal murders on his behalf. Starring Ryan Kiser and Reid Warner

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet

programme.title: Cruel Summer
programme.desc: An autistic teenager heads into the woods seeking some peace and quiet, unaware that three thugs with their own agendas are closing in on him. Drama, starring Danny Miller, Reece Douglas and Richard Pawulski

programme.title: Mercury Plains
programme.desc: A troubled teenager runs away from home and crosses the border into Mexico. He is recruited by a mysterious paramilitary organisation, that battles against drug cartels, supposedly in the pursuit of law and order, while actually stealing from the criminals. As the group's actions grow more violent, he searches for a way to escape with his life. Action adventure, starring Scott Eastwood, Angela Sarafyan and Andy Garcia

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: International thief Simon Templar, a cunning master of disguise with a Swiss bank account almost full enough to retire on, accepts one last job - to steal a female scientist's formula for cold fusion. However, he breaks his own golden rule by getting emotionally involved with the woman, leading to a deadly chase as the pair meet up in Russia and try to flee from the real bad guys. Action adventure, starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue and Henry Goodman

programme.title: The Hollow Point
programme.desc: A hard-drinking sheriff and his deputy are pitted against a sadistic cartel hitman. Crime thriller, starring Patrick Wilson, Ian McShane and John Leguizamo

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger

programme.title: Body of Lies
programme.desc: CIA agent Roger Ferris hatches a bold but dangerous plan to capture terrorist Al-Saleem. With the help of Ed Hoffman who is a master of subterfuge, Ferris creates a fake terrorist organization to prompt Al-Saleem out of hiding. Spy thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Desierto
programme.desc: A group of immigrants hoping to make it across the US-Mexico border are targeted by a deranged, gun-wielding vigilante. Thriller, starring Gael Garcia Bernal and Jeffrey Dean Morgan

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: A former CIA agent raises his daughter alone in the wilderness of Finland, teaching her to be the world's deadliest assassin. When she turns 16, she is sent to carry out her one intended mission, but as she travels the world in search of her target, she is pursued by a CIA operative with a link to her mysterious past. Action thriller, with Saoirse Ronan, Cate Blanchett and Eric Bana

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger

programme.title: The Silence of the Lambs
programme.desc: Trainee FBI agent Clarice Starling is sent to interview an imprisoned psychopath with a taste for eating his victims. The inmate offers to help catch a serial killer who is holding a politician's daughter hostage - but to learn what he knows, Clarice has to engage in his dangerous mind games. Jonathan Demme's Oscar-winning thriller, based on Thomas Harris's novel, starring Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Scott Glenn and Ted Levine

programme.title: Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: A crew of former prisoners are hired by a Cleveland crime syndicate to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe and Christopher Matthew Cook

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: A man travelling through Chile in the 1970s is abducted by the secret police during the military coup that brought Pinochet to power. His girlfriend tries to find out what has happened to him, but to uncover the truth, she must join a cult posing as a charitable organisation, from which no one has ever escaped. Drama, starring Emma Watson and Daniel Bruhl

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: A founding member of a secret society of assassins struggles to cope, as memories of his past misdeeds cause panic attacks and his family starts to fall apart. When he breaks down during the torture of a captive, his employers fear he is no longer reliable - and threaten the lives of his wife and daughter. Action thriller, starring Craig Fairbrass and James Cosmo

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A charming bank robber breaks out of jail and takes a female US Marshal hostage. Managing to escape, she sets out to track him down as he prepares for one last job - but as the chase intensifies, so do their feelings for each other. Steven Soderbergh's romantic crime drama, based on Elmore Leonard's novel, with George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames and Don Cheadle

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: Imperium
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a white supremacist movement to prevent their planned terrorist attack. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Radcliffe and Toni Collette

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Fugitive serial killer Dr Hannibal Lecter has gone into hiding as an academic in Italy, but a disfigured victim is determined to find him and inflict a gruesome revenge. FBI agent Clarice Starling is once again drawn into the doctor's deadly orbit as she finds herself being used as bait for the avenger's trap. Ridley Scott's thriller sequel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Follow
programme.desc: A young man gets a strange Christmas gift from his girlfriend, blacks out and then wakes up the next day to find his life crumbling around him. Horror, starring Noah Segan, Haley Lu Richardson and Don Most(n)

programme.title: The Joker
programme.desc: A young cop is kidnapped by a masked serial killer. To keep himself alive, the captive detective must rely on the wisdom imparted to him by his older colleagues during their regular poker night, hoping that one of their tall tales might provide the inspiration he needs to outwit the murderer. Thriller, starring Beau Mirchoff and Ron Perlman(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos(n)

programme.title: Exposed
programme.desc: A detective is determined to bring his dead partner's killers to justice, despite warnings from both his superior officers and the murdered man's wife to forget about it. As he delves deeper, he uncovers dangerous secrets and evidence of political corruption, with a devoutly religious woman seemingly the key to the mystery. Crime thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Ana de Armas and Mira Sorvino(n)

programme.title: Careful What You Wish For
programme.desc: A teenager gets more than he bargained for after entering into an affair with the wife of an investment banker, as a suspicious death and substantial life insurance policy embroil him in a scandal. Thriller, starring Nick Jonas, Dermot Mulroney and Isabel Lucas(n)

programme.title: 10 Cent Pistol
programme.desc: A pair of low-life criminal brothers target the powerful LA mobster who left one of them rotting in prison. Crime caper, starring Jena Malone and Joe Mantegna(n)

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: A heroic firefighter is plunged into the world of international terrorism when his wife and child are killed in a horrific attack. Disillusioned with the progress of the official investigation, he decides to take on the villains himself and heads for Colombia on a dangerous mission of revenge, determined to bring the perpetrators to justice. Action thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Francesca Neri, Elias Koteas and Cliff Curtis(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A tight-knit FBI team is torn apart when the daughter of one of the agents is raped and murdered, and the case goes unsolved. Years later, a member of the team uncovers a new clue that he hopes will allow him to bring the killer to justice. However, the victim's grieving mother is dissatisfied with the law and takes matters into her own hands. Crime drama, starring Julia Roberts, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Nicole Kidman(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two mismatched undercover cops set out to halt an underground gang war and bring down a drug lord attempting to flood the market with a deadly form of Ecstasy. However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare(n)

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: A high-school counsellor is accused of rape by a student whose advances he spurned - and unfortunately for him, one of her peers backs up her story. Thriller, starring Neve Campbell, Denise Richards, Matt Dillon, Kevin Bacon, Theresa Russell, Robert Wagner and Bill Murray(n)

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince an Irish gypsy to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Meanwhile, the loot from a diamond heist goes missing, leading to a bloody conflict between Russian gangsters and a Jewish mob. Guy Ritchie's comedy drama, with Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro and Stephen Graham(n)

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A man wakes from a coma to discover Britain has been struck by a terrifying experimental virus that sends victims into a homicidal rage. With a handful of other survivors, he heads for Manchester, the last outpost unaffected by the outbreak - but realises the virus is not the only threat. Danny Boyle's horror, starring Cillian Murphy, Naomie Harris, Brendan Gleeson and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: The US military oversees the repopulation of Britain after a virus that turned those infected into bloodthirsty killers finally dies out. Two children sneak away from a London safe zone and make a discovery that threatens to unleash the virus again. Juan Carlos Fresnadillo's horror sequel to 28 Days Later, with Robert Carlyle, Rose Byrne, Jeremy Renner, Imogen Poots and Idris Elba

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: Three students break into a house mistakenly thinking it belongs to their friend, and end up accidentally killing the groundskeeper who catches them trespassing. They try to come up with an elaborate lie to cover up their crime, but their consiences begin to trouble them, with deadly consequences. Thriller, starring Helen Rogers, Alexandra Turshen and Lauren Molina

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The cast of a cancelled sci-fi series are reduced to a life of conventions and public appearances, only to find themselves genuinely transported into space. Naive aliens have mistaken the show for real life and want the actors to help defend them from an evil extraterrestrial warlord. Sci-fi comedy, starring Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Alan Rickman and Sam Rockwell

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The caped crusader and his sidekick Robin discover that four of their worst enemies are now working together. The villains plan to use a machine that turns people into dust at a gathering of world leaders, allowing them to seize power. Comedy adventure based on the TV series, starring Adam West, Burt Ward, Burgess Meredith and Frank Gorshin

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a future dominated by the deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan. Sci-fi adventure, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The caped crusader and his sidekick Robin discover that four of their worst enemies are now working together. The villains plan to use a machine that turns people into dust at a gathering of world leaders, allowing them to seize power. Comedy adventure based on the TV series, starring Adam West, Burt Ward, Burgess Meredith and Frank Gorshin

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a future dominated by the deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan. Sci-fi adventure, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg

programme.title: The Crow
programme.desc: A guitarist and his fiancee are murdered on Halloween by the henchman of a world-weary gangster. One year later, the musician is restored to the land of the living by a mystical crow, and rendered indestructible so he can take revenge on the killers. Fantasy thriller based on the graphic novel, starring Brandon Lee, Michael Wincott and Ernie Hudson

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: An elite military unit is flown to a top secret facility for a training exercise. The soldiers are intended to be put to the test in a battle simulation against robots, but when the machines start trying to really kill them, they discover a deadly threat to the human race. Sci-fi thriller, starring Vanessa Kirby and Thure Lindhardt

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: In the sequel to Batman Begins, the masked hero finds a new ally in his war on organised crime in Gotham's crusading new district attorney, Harvey Dent. However, both men are pushed to their limits by the rise of the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos and destruction throughout the city for his own amusement. Comic-book thriller, starring Christian Bale, Aaron Eckhart and an Oscar-winning Heath Ledger

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Conflict erupts between the defenders of a kingdom and an invading horde that has travelled from a dying world. Fantasy adventure based on the best-selling computer game, starring Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton and Ben Foster

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: In the sequel to Batman Begins, the masked hero finds a new ally in his war on organised crime in Gotham's crusading new district attorney, Harvey Dent. However, both men are pushed to their limits by the rise of the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos and destruction throughout the city for his own amusement. Comic-book thriller, starring Christian Bale, Aaron Eckhart and an Oscar-winning Heath Ledger

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Conflict erupts between the defenders of a kingdom and an invading horde that has travelled from a dying world. Fantasy adventure based on the best-selling computer game, starring Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton and Ben Foster

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: An elite military unit is flown to a top secret facility for a training exercise. The soldiers are intended to be put to the test in a battle simulation against robots, but when the machines start trying to really kill them, they discover a deadly threat to the human race. Sci-fi thriller, starring Vanessa Kirby and Thure Lindhardt(n)

programme.title: Carnage Park
programme.desc: Two criminals take a woman hostage and flee into the backwoods following a disastrous bank robbery. What should have been a safe haven proves a far greater threat than the cops on their trail when they stray into the territory of a former military sniper driven by his experiences of war and who does not take kindly to strangers on his land. Horror, starring Ashley Bell and Pat Healy(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw(n)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: A soldier of fortune joins an academic and her conniving brother on an expedition to an ancient Egyptian lost city. The explorers accidentally cause the spirit of a vengeful priest with awe-inspiring supernatural powers to rise from his tomb, leading to a desperate battle for survival. Fantasy action adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo and Oded Fehr(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes battle more bad guys when Shredder breaks out of custody and teams up with the villainous Krang. Action comedy sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Laura Linney(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen(n)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: A soldier of fortune joins an academic and her conniving brother on an expedition to an ancient Egyptian lost city. The explorers accidentally cause the spirit of a vengeful priest with awe-inspiring supernatural powers to rise from his tomb, leading to a desperate battle for survival. Fantasy action adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo and Oded Fehr(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The sewer-dwelling heroes battle more bad guys when Shredder breaks out of custody and teams up with the villainous Krang. Action comedy sequel, starring Megan Fox, Will Arnett and Laura Linney(n)

programme.title: Abattoir
programme.desc: A reporter investigates the story of a man trying to build a haunted house out of rooms where terrible things have happened. Horror from Saw veteran Darren Lynn Bousman, starring Joe Anderson, Jessica Lowndes and Lin Shaye(n)

programme.title: Black
programme.desc: Mavela, a 15-year-old in Brussels gang The Black Bronx, must choose between love and loyalty when she falls for Marwan, a Moroccan boy from rival group the 1080s. Drama, starring Martha Canga Antonio, Aboubakr Bensaihi and Sanaa Alaoui

programme.title: Across the Line
programme.desc: A black ice hockey player's dream of going pro are threatened by racial tensions in his Nova Scotia community. Canadian sports drama, starring Stephan James and Sarah Jeffery

programme.title: The Prince and the Showgirl
programme.desc: A European prince visiting London for the coronation of George V becomes fascinated by an American showgirl, who then falls in love with him. When she discovers his estranged son is embroiled in a treasonous plot to overthrow his father, she comes up with a solution to stop the intrigue and reunite the pair. Romantic comedy, starring Marilyn Monroe and Laurence Olivier, who also directed. With Sybil Thorndike and Richard Wattis

programme.title: Long Way North
programme.desc: A Russian aristocrat travels to the North Pole in search of her grandfather, a missing explorer. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chloe Dunn, Geoffrey Greenhill and Tom Morton

programme.title: Hyena Road
programme.desc: Adept Canadian sharpshooter Ryan Sanders and his unit are forced to take refuge with an village elder while on the run from Taliban fanatics in Afghanistan. Resigned to their fate, the soldiers anxiously wait for the old man to betray them to his countrymen, but instead he saves their lives, then disappears without a trace. When Sanders reports this unusual turn of events on his return to Kandahar, seasoned intelligence officer Pete Mitchell is convinced the sniper has happened upon the legendary Afghan freedom fighter known as the Ghost, and enlists Sanders' aid in tracking the man down once again to assist in the war effort. Military drama, starring Rossif Sutherland and director Paul Gross

programme.title: The Surprise
programme.desc: After signing an agreement with a company specialising in assisted suicides, a deeply depressed man suddenly falls in love. Romantic comedy, starring Jeroen van Koningsbrugge, Georgina Verbaan and Jan Decleir

programme.title: Just Jim
programme.desc: A Welsh teenager leads a lonely life after being rejected by his only friend. He becomes fascinated by a mysterious American who moves in next door, and the new arrival offers him some advice on how to be cool. The youngster starts to develop the life he had always longed for, but begins to wonder if he was happier the way he used to be. Comedy drama, starring Emile Hirsch and Craig Roberts

programme.title: My Internship In Canada
programme.desc: An independent MP from rural Quebec unexpectedly finds himself holding the tie-breaking vote on whether Canada should go to war. Political comedy, starring Patrick Huard, Irdens Exantus and Suzanne Clement

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The manager of a struggling baseball team faces disaster, as his star players are bought out by richer clubs and he is unable to afford to replace them. An economics student offers him a solution to his problems, finding a ground-breaking way to analyse the performance of cheaper players and combining their abilities to form a winning side. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: A radio DJ contemplates suicide after a listener embarks on a murderous rampage in response to one of his broadcasts. He is saved by a now-homeless former professor of medieval history, who encourages him to retrieve what he claims is the Holy Grail. When the DJ later learns that he is responsible for his saviour's misfortunes, he feels compelled to make amends. Terry Gilliam's comedy drama, with Robin Williams, Jeff Bridges, Amanda Plummer and Mercedes Ruehl

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: Hungry Hearts
programme.desc: A young mother becomes irrationally and dangerously fixated with her baby's health. Psychological drama, starring Adam Driver, Alba Rohrwacher and Roberta Maxwell

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: American officer Aldo Raine leads a squad of soldiers into occupied France on a mission to kill as many Nazis as possible and spread fear through the Third Reich. They become involved in a Jewish resistance fighter's plan to blow up the premiere of a propaganda movie - due to be attended by Hitler himself. Quentin Tarantino's wartime adventure, with Brad Pitt, Melanie Laurent, Diane Kruger, Michael Fassbender and an Oscar-winning Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A streetwise Brooklyn teenager struggles to cope with a dead-end job and a dysfunctional family, but finds an escape in the disco scene, where he falls in love with a girl dreaming of breaking free from her equally poor background to pursue a brighter future in Manhattan. Drama, starring John Travolta, Karen Lynn Gorney and Paul Pape, and featuring songs by the Bee Gees

programme.title: The Crow's Egg
programme.desc: Comedy-drama following a pair of poverty stricken Indian brothers determined to earn the money to eat at a new pizza parlour. Starring Vignesh, Ramesh and Iyshwarya Rajesh

programme.title: Up for Love
programme.desc: A diminutive architect woos a beautiful lawyer over the phone, but it remains to be seen whether his stature will prove a stumbling block. French romantic comedy, starring Jean Dujardin, Virginie Efira and Cedric Kahn

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: A young New Yorker's plan to have a kid on her own is derailed when she falls for a married man. Romantic comedy, starring Greta Gerwig, Ethan Hawke and Bill Hader

programme.title: Already Tomorrow In Hong Kong
programme.desc: Sparks fly when a toy designer visiting Hong Kong gets talking to an expat American businessman. Romantic drama starring Jamie Chung and Bryan Greenberg

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough

programme.title: Cafe Society
programme.desc: In the 1930s, a Bronx youngster heads to Hollywood and falls for the beautiful secretary of his powerful agent uncle. Woody Allen's romantic comedy, starring Steve Carell, Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart

programme.title: The Black Orchid
programme.desc: A gangster's widow blames herself for her husband's death, as she becomes the subject of malicious rumours that she drove him to a life of crime. A man who is also widowed falls in love with her, but his daughter is determined to stop them from marrying. Comedy, starring Sophia Loren, Anthony Quinn, Ina Balin and Peter Mark Richman

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: A lowly insurance clerk tries to curry favour with his seedy manager by lending him his flat for his extramarital flings. But the clerk soon grows wise to the nastiness of corporate ethics and infidelity when his heartless boss seduces the elevator girl, whom he has always loved from afar. Oscar-winning comedy drama, directed by Billy Wilder and starring Jack Lemmon, Fred MacMurray and Shirley MacLaine

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: A doomed love affair between two Wyoming cowboys develops over the course of 20 years. The relationship begins when they are hired to herd sheep on a remote mountain in the 1960s, and though they go their separate ways and try to settle down to married life, they are unable to overcome their desire for each other and continue to meet in secret. Ang Lee's drama, starring Heath Ledger, Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Williams and Anne Hathaway

programme.title: After Love
programme.desc: After 15 years of marriage, a couple with two children prepare to divorce. However, as the husband needs to find a new place to live, they have to cohabit, and figure out how to share their belongings. Drama, starring Berenice Bejo and Cedric Kahn(n)

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy raised in South Africa's Cape Flats gets caught up in a volatile subculture dominated by two rival gangs. Thriller, starring Brendon Daniels, Jezriel Skei and Lindiwe Matshikiza(n)

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: Three sisters who share a house together receive word that their estranged father has died. They travel to attend his funeral, only to discover he has a teenage daughter by another mother, who is now an orphan. They invite the girl to live with them, sparking a journey of self-discovery for all four women. Drama based on Akimi Yoshida's comic-book series, starring Haruka Ayase, Masami Nagasawa, Kaho and Suzu Hirose. In Japanese(n)

programme.title: Theeb
programme.desc: A Bedouin boy living in an Ottoman province during the First World War offers to help his brother guide a British officer on a perilous journey through the desert to a secret destination. He gradually becomes more aware of the devastating events occurring in the world around him and is forced to grow up quickly. Drama, starring Jacir Eid Al-Hwietat and Jack Fox. In Arabic(n)

programme.title: God's Pocket
programme.desc: A construction worker believes his life will be simpler following the death of his troublemaking stepson. However, he finds things go from bad to worse as his relationship with his wife deteriorates and a reporter grows suspicious about the tragedy. Drama based on Peter Dexter's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Christina Hendricks and John Turturro(n)

programme.title: I Won't Come Back
programme.desc: A student on the run from the police decides to hit the road with a young orphan determined to track down the only family she has left. Russian drama, starring Polina Pushkaruk, Vika Lobachova and Andrey Astrakhantsev(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman(n)

programme.title: Escape from Alcatraz
programme.desc: A cunning convict with a history of making escape attempts is transferred to the notorious high-security island prison off the California coast, from which no one has ever broken out. Continually at odds with the brutal warden, he and three fellow prisoners hatch a plan to make it to freedom on an improvised raft. Thriller, based on a true story, starring Clint Eastwood, Patrick McGoohan, Roberts Blossom and Fred Ward(n)

programme.title: Reds
programme.desc: Oscar-winning fact-based drama, based on the life of American journalist and activist John Reed, famous for his first-hand account of the 1917 Russian Revolution. The film focuses on his relationship with writer Louise Bryant, whom he first encounters at a meeting for radical thinkers. Leaving her husband, she joins Reed on his journey to Russia as the Bolshevik uprising gets under way. Directed by and starring Warren Beatty. With Diane Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Edward Herrmann(n)

programme.title: Election
programme.desc: A teacher develops an irrational dislike for an overambitious student and plans to sabotage her campaign for school president. He persuades a dim-witted athlete to stand, in the hope he will pip the high-achieving front-runner to the post - but the intervention of another student throws the plan into disarray. Satirical comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Reese Witherspoon, Chris Klein and Jessica Campbell(n)

programme.title: The Darjeeling Limited
programme.desc: Three brothers drift apart after their father's death. A year later, the eldest arranges for the other two to join him on a soul-searching trip across India to rebuild their relationship and track down their estranged mother. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, starring Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody, Jason Schwartzman and Anjelica Huston(n)

programme.title: The Innocents
programme.desc: In 1945 Poland, a young French Red Cross doctor is sent to assist the survivors of the German camps and discovers several nuns in advanced states of pregnancy during a visit to a nearby convent. Fact-based drama, starring Lou de Laage, Agata Buzek and Agata Kulesza(n)

programme.title: King Boxer
programme.desc: Two competing martial arts schools vie to win a competition, with Chao Chi-Hao going from hard-grafting novice to expert fighter able to dispense vengeance with his `Iron Fist' technique. Action adventure,starring Lieh Lo, Ping Wang and Hsiung Chao. In Mandarin

programme.title: Baggage Claim
programme.desc: An air hostess is horrified at the thought of her younger sister getting married while she is still single. She realises her job gives her access to eligible men from across America, and begins clocking up thousands of air miles as she scours the country for a potential fiance. Romantic comedy, with Paula Patton and Taye Diggs(c)

programme.title: Patti Cake$ Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Geremy Jasper and stars Danielle Macdonald, Cathy Moriarty, Bridget Everett and Siddharth Dhananjay talk about making the comedy(c)

programme.title: The Book of Life
programme.desc: A man who longs to be a musician instead of a bullfighter like his father has to compete with a childhood friend when they fall for the same woman. Their love triangle catches the eye of the spirits of the dead, leading him on a journey through their bizarre world. Animated adventure, with the voices of Diego Luna, Zoe Saldana and Channing Tatum

programme.title: Carry On Constable
programme.desc: A flu epidemic leaves a police station short of staff, forcing a desperate inspector to send four bungling trainees on the beat. The inept would-be bobbies manage to increase the crime rate even before they have started work, and their long-suffering sergeant faces an uphill battle to whip them into shape. Comedy, starring Sid James, Kenneth Williams, Kenneth Connor, Charles Hawtrey and Joan Sims

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A scientist and four members of his crew develop superhuman powers after exposure to cosmic radiation on a mission to study an energy storm in space. Unfortunately, one of them chooses to use his new-found abilities for evil purposes, compelling the others to join forces to stop him. Sci-fi comic-book adventure, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis and Julian McMahon

programme.title: Mrs Doubtfire
programme.desc: A struggling actor's ambitious, no-nonsense wife throws him out and demands a divorce. Desperate to spend time with his children, he puts his talents to good use by donning drag and posing as a Scottish housekeeper to get a job looking after them. Comedy, starring Robin Williams, Sally Field, Pierce Brosnan, Harvey Fierstein and Mara Wilson

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: Two young girls go missing in Pennsylvania over the Thanksgiving holidays, and suspicion initially falls on Alex Jones, a young man with apparent learning difficulties, who was spotted near the children's last known location. When no evidence of wrongdoing is found, Jones is freed from custody, but the distraught father of one of the missing youngsters is not convinced of Jones' innocence, and kidnaps him in the hope of extracting a confession by force. Thriller, starring Hugh Jackman, Jake Gyllenhaal and Paul Dano

programme.title: Solomon Kane
programme.desc: A 17th-century mercenary renounces violence after an encounter with a demon convinces him he is going to Hell. However, when a girl is captured by an evil sorcerer, he takes up arms once more, using his fighting skills to slay the forces of evil and redeem himself for his past sins. Period fantasy thriller, starring James Purefoy, Max Von Sydow and Pete Postlethwaite

programme.title: The Evil Dead
programme.desc: Five students staying in a remote cabin find an ancient magical book, and unwittingly unleash evil spirits on the world. The dark forces they have conjured up possess them one by one, transforming them into ravenous zombies with an insatiable desire to feast on the living. Sam Raimi's horror, starring Bruce Campbell and Ellen Sandweiss

programme.title: The Phantom
programme.desc: A jungle-dwelling masked adventurer leaves his African home for New York in a bid to stop the power-crazed schemes of an evil industrialist. The tycoon is on the hunt for three legendary magical skulls, which can be combined to form the ultimate weapon. Superhero adventure, starring Billy Zane, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Treat Williams and Patrick McGoohan

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Three bungling kidnappers hatch a plan to pose as society reporters and snatch the baby son of a wealthy couple. However, the infant escapes on to the streets of New York, evading the crooks' every attempt to recapture him. Comedy, starring Joe Mantegna, Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley

programme.title: Eragon
programme.desc: A young farm boy discovers a dragon's egg, which hatches into the last surviving specimen of its mighty race. His friendship with the winged creature soon comes in handy when he discovers he is destined to overthrow the evil tyrant who has taken control of the kingdom. Fantasy adventure, starring Ed Speleers, Jeremy Irons, Robert Carlyle and Sienna Guillory, with Rachel Weisz providing the voice of the dragon

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomon's diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichton's novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: A London man's misfortunes in love look set to change when he meets an American beauty. However, the prospect of a transatlantic relationship succeeding seems slim, so the pair go their separate ways - only for him to realise he is unable to get her out of his mind. Richard Curtis's comedy, with Hugh Grant, Andie MacDowell, John Hannah, Charlotte Coleman, Kristin Scott Thomas, Simon Callow and James Fleet

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: A prison psychologist probes the mind of a maximum-security inmate, an expert on primate behaviour, to find out what made the zoologist go berserk and murder two park rangers in Rwanda. Drama, inspired by Daniel Quinn's novel Ishmael, starring Anthony Hopkins, Cuba Gooding Jr, Donald Sutherland, George Dzundza and Maura Tierney

programme.title: Mindscape
programme.desc: A psychic with the ability to explore people's memories uses his talents to aid the police, until a case goes disastrously wrong. Desperate for work, he agrees to help a wealthy couple discover why their teenage daughter is on a hunger strike, but beings to fear she is manipulating her memories to deceive him. Fantasy thriller, starring Mark Strong, Taissa Farmiga and Brian Cox(n)

programme.title: Hatari
programme.desc: A group of reckless animal trappers travels through the wilds of Africa, but the arrival of a beautiful photographer looks set to cause upheaval among the group. Comedy adventure, starring John Wayne, Red Buttons, Hardy Kruger, Elsa Martinelli and Michele Girardon(n)

programme.title: The Blue Dahlia
programme.desc: A war-weary pilot returns home from service in Europe, but his welcome is far from warm. Not only must he deal with the news of his wife's infidelities, but he also finds himself accused of her murder. However, the wife of his dead spouse's lover is on hand to help him prove his innocence. Thriller, written by Raymond Chandler and starring Alan Ladd, Veronica Lake, William Bendix and Doris Dowling(n)

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: Rancher Shep Horgan takes in injured drifter Jubal, and offers him a job. However, a jealous ranch hand takes a dislike to the new arrival, and tries to persuade Horgan that Jubal is having an affair with his wife. Western, starring Glenn Ford, Rod Steiger, Valerie French, Charles Bronson and Ernest Borgnine(n)

programme.title: Seven Years in Tibet
programme.desc: An arrogant Austrian mountaineer tries to become the first to conquer a peak in India that has claimed the lives of 11 previous climbers. However, the outbreak of the Second World War leaves him languishing in a PoW camp. He escapes and ends up in the holy city of Lhasa, where he befriends the 14-year-old Dalai Lama and learns the meaning of inner peace. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, David Thewlis and BD Wong(n)

programme.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
programme.desc: A puny but brave volunteer is rejected for military service during the Second World War. He becomes the test subject for an experiment that transforms him into the ultimate soldier, and battles against a secret Nazi society plotting to harness the powers of a mystical artefact. Superhero adventure, with Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Hayley Atwell and Tommy Lee Jones(n)

programme.title: Outrageous Fortune
programme.desc: A porn star and a drama student discover they have one thing in common - they are being two-timed by the same man. When their lover mysteriously disappears, they team up to find him, only to learn he is an agent of a foreign power and has implicated them in his espionage schemes. Comedy, starring Bette Midler, Shelley Long, Peter Coyote and Robert Prosky(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John is nervous about attending a high-school reunion, feeling that his friends have all achieved more than he has

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy shows a reporter writing a guide book around the community, but John worries about what he might uncover

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Caroline convinces herself she is going to have another baby, but Doc Baker tells her she is clutching at straws and will never have any more children. To cheer her up, Charles arranges for them to renew their wedding vows. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. Charles and Albert go on a delivery run and meet the Cooper family. Whilst tackling a steep hill, Alvin loses control of his wagon leading to a tragic accident. Charles later sends two children to live in a distant orphanage, but then begins to have doubts about what he's done

programme.title: No One Would Tell
programme.desc: A shy teenager thinks all her dreams have come true when the school's star athlete asks her out. However, the relationship soon turns sour as her seemingly perfect boyfriend becomes possessive, controlling and violent. Drama, starring Fred Savage, Candace Cameron Bure, Gregory Alan Williams and Rodney Eastman

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy catches his friend Yancy Tucker stealing two chickens and agonises over whether to report him. With Richard Thomas and Robert Donner

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A forthcoming county fair brings out a streak of competitiveness in the family. Olivia is surprised to hear her childhood sweetheart, the now wealthy Oscar Cockrell, is to be one of the judges. Peter Donat guest stars

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Orphan Hobart Shank comes to stay and John-Boy tries to get him a contract as a professional baseball player - but tragedy strikes when he breaks his arm in a fall, destroying his one chance at fame

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin finds an orphaned fawn and decides to nurse it back to health, while John-Boy's new job as a rent collector makes him extremely unpopular with the locals. Charles Tyner guest stars, with Richard Thomas

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: A priest harbours a secret desire for a woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church. Romantic drama based on Colleen McCullough's novel, with Richard Chamberlain

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: A priest harbours a secret desire for a woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church. Romantic drama based on Colleen McCullough's novel, with Richard Chamberlain

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: Romantic drama based on the novel. A priest harbours a secret desire for a beautiful woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: Romantic drama based on the novel by Colleen McCullough. A priest harbours a secret desire for a beautiful woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church

programme.title: Shaka Zulu
programme.desc: Joshua Sinclair reinvents the real-life story of how the mythical warrior Shaka Zulu (Henry Cele) defended the Zulu kingdom from the empirical force of the west in the 19th century. Unequipped with the advanced firearms that their foes wielded, the drama explores how Shaka organised his people to defend themselves from such a might force. Grace Jones also stars

programme.title: Shaka Zulu
programme.desc: Driven by an ancient tribal prophecy, Shaka unites his people into a bold new nation. Biopic of the 19th century African leader, starring Henry Cele

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason struggles to find time to cope with his studies, his girlfriend and his band

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy writes an article about a woman who performs wing walking stunts, whom Jim-Bob falls for. However, she mistakenly thinks John-Boy is her secret admirer. Maude Gormley gives her goat to the family in return for a rocking chair

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Cassandra and James run away from their new adoptive father, who's so indifferent to their welfare that he doesn't even bother to look for them. Fortunately, they eventually end up back at the Ingalls household, where Charles comes up with a solution to their plight

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Reincarnation of Nellie - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mrs Oleson decides she wants a surrogate daughter now that Nellie's gone to New York, and the spiteful Nancy proves just the person she is looking for

programme.title: Tribute
programme.desc: A former child star buys her grandmother's house to rescue it from ruin, but her hope for serenity is soon eclipsed by haunting dreams of her famous dead grandmother. Drama, starring Brittany Murphy and Jason Lewis

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. The anticipated joy of Thanksgiving turns to sorrow for the family when John-Boy suffers a head injury

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The children are unhappy when Miss Hunter needs to take leave because of a family emergency and a substitute teacher is sent to take over her job

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma inherits an old friend's legacy and promptly decides to share the proceeds between her grandchildren, but her well-meaning action has unforeseen consequences

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes and the Incident at Victoria Falls
programme.desc: Part one of two. The detective is embroiled in murder and intrigue while escorting the world's most precious diamond from Africa. Mystery, with Christopher Lee and Patrick Macnee

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes and the Incident at Victoria Falls
programme.desc: Part two of two. The detective is embroiled in murder and intrigue while escorting the world's most precious diamond from Africa. Mystery, with Christopher Lee and Patrick Macnee

programme.title: Agatha Christie's A Caribbean Mystery
programme.desc: Miss Marple arrives in the Bahamas for rest and recuperation, where she encounters a retired army officer with a secret to reveal. He claims to have proof that a guest at the resort is a killer, but before he can specify who, he is poisoned and the incriminating evidence disappears. It falls to the indomitable amateur sleuth to unmask the culprit. Drama, with Helen Hayes, Barnard Hughes, Season Hubley and Swoosie Kurtz

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Sparkling Cyanide
programme.desc: Modern reworking of Agatha Christie's classic murder mystery, starring Pauline Collins, Oliver Ford Davies, Kenneth Cranham and Susan Hampshire. A football chairman hosts a glitzy party to celebrate a new signing, but as the guests raise their glasses to toast a successful future, his wife suddenly drops dead. A pair of MI5 agents are called in to investigate, and it's not long before the finger of suspicion points at the victim's husband - until he too is murdered

programme.title: Anybody's Nightmare
programme.desc: A day trip leads to nightmare as an elderly woman is found dead in suspicious circumstances, and the finger of blame points squarely at her respectable niece. Drama based on the true story of piano teacher Sheila Fowler, whose conviction for murder on the age-old grounds of greed led to a life sentence only overturned by years of tireless campaigning on the part of her friends. Starring Patricia Routledge and Georgina Sutcliffe

programme.title: Convoy
programme.desc: A renegade trucker clashes with a redneck sheriff and the authorities in general as he leads a mammoth convoy across America. Sam Pekinpah's road movie inspired by the song by CW McCall, starring Kris Kristofferson, Ali MacGraw, Ernest Borgnine, Burt Young and Madge Sinclair

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: A safecracker comes dangerously close to getting caught red-handed, so decides the time has come to quit his life of crime. However, an old friend soon tempts him back with the chance to steal a priceless French artefact being stored in a customs house, and he joins forces with a talented young thief to carry out one last heist. Crime thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Edward Norton, Marlon Brando and Angela Bassett

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Richie misses out on a rock concert when he has to look after the hardware store(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A new pupil at the school has troubled reading, but Elizabeth realises why and finds a way to help him(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Reincarnation of Nellie - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Mrs Oleson's adopted daughter Nancy continues with her scheme to become the star of the school's annual festival(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Newly adopted James decides that he is not wanted and runs away, causing concern among his friends and family(n)

programme.title: Anybody's Nightmare
programme.desc: A day trip leads to nightmare as an elderly woman is found dead in suspicious circumstances, and the finger of blame points squarely at her respectable niece. Drama based on the true story of piano teacher Sheila Fowler, whose conviction for murder on the age-old grounds of greed led to a life sentence only overturned by years of tireless campaigning on the part of her friends. Starring Patricia Routledge and Georgina Sutcliffe(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark agrees to sell his soul in return for saving a girl's life - but unwittingly allows the Devil to obtain the spirit of an angel(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan intervenes when a factory causes water pollution, but finds the employees unwilling to help, even when their children's health is affected. Paul Walker guest stars(n)

programme.title: Elvis: The Early Years
programme.desc: The first in a two-part biopic of the king of rock 'n' roll, Elvis Presley, charting his humble beginnings in Tupelo, Mississippi, to his recordings at Sun Studios in Memphis and his conscription into the US army. Jonathan Rhys Meyers plays the singer, with Rose McGowan, Camryn Manheim and Randy Quaid(n)

programme.title: Elvis: The Early Years
programme.desc: Conclusion of the rock 'n' roll biopic, starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers as the much-loved performer. Following his varied film career and the rise of pop music, Elvis stages a comeback, but his reliance on drugs intensifies as the demands of fame take hold. With Rose McGowan and Randy Quaid(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Emily thinks her lost love has come back to her, only to discover it is his son, who is more interested in Erin. Guest starring Jonathan Frakes (Star Trek: The Next Generation)(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The children put their lives in danger when they try to imitate the stunts of an ageing circus daredevil who arrives in Walnut Grove. Jack Kruschen guest stars(n)

programme.title: The Triumph
programme.desc: An idealistic teacher gives up his small-town job in favour of a new life in New York, where he takes up the challenge of working in one of the country's toughest schools. Fact-based drama, starring Matthew Perry, with Ernie Hudson and Hannah Hodson(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Blackboard
programme.desc: A newly qualified teacher sets up a makeshift classroom for homeless teenagers. Initially afraid and suspicious of her students, she gradually gets to know them and becomes determined to make a difference to their difficult lives. Fact-based drama, starring Emily VanCamp, Steve Talley and Treat Williams(n)

programme.title: Firelight
programme.desc: A group of young inmates are given the opportunity to turn their lives around by becoming volunteer firefighters. Drama, starring Cuba Gooding Jr(n)

programme.title: Judgment Day: The Ellie Nesler Story
programme.desc: A distraught mother goes on trial for shooting dead a youth counsellor who she discovered had been molesting her son. However, the family's already harrowing ordeal is made even worse by the discovery she is suffering from terminal cancer. Drama based on a true story, starring Christine Lahti, Mary Kay Place, Robert Bockstael, Barry Corbin and Andrew Ducote(n)

programme.title: Sleeping with the Devil
programme.desc: A woman's life is turned upside down by the discovery that her seemingly perfect boyfriend is psychotically unbalanced and, as his mania increases, he pays a killer to gun her down. Drama, starring Shannen Doherty, Tim Matheson, Bonnie Bartlett and Steve Eastin(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A medical researcher accuses a rival doctor of attacking him with a syringe full of lethal drugs, but when he is later found murdered, the bitter feud between the two medics turns out to be just the tip of the iceberg for DCI Burke and the team. Both men have many enemies, especially after their drug trials resulted in a woman's death, and affairs of the heart muddy the water for the detectives in their search for the real killer. Drama, starring Blythe Duff and Alex Norton

programme.title: An Eye For Beauty
programme.desc: Luc is a brilliant young architect with a budding reputation. Opinionated, charming and confident, he lives with his beautiful wife in the stunning countryside of Quebec. Luc's seemingly perfect life begins to fall apart, however, when he meets and falls for a mysterious woman during a business trip. Caught in a triangle of emotions, he puts everything in jeopardy to pursue his affair, including the life he has built and the woman he loves

programme.title: A Game of Honor
programme.desc: This feature length documentary captures a never-before-seen look at the Division 1 football teams at the U.S. Military Academy at West Point and the U.S. Naval Academy at Annapolis, rigorous programs of military training, elite classroom education and athletic preparation for their cadets and midshipmen that culminates each year in the Army-Navy Football Game, an institution in American sports

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: When the seaside community of Amity finds itself under attack by a dangerous great white shark, the town's chief of police (Roy Scheider), a young marine biologist (Richard Dreyfuss) and a grizzled shark hunter (Robert Shaw) embark on a desperate quest to destroy the beast before it strikes again

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd and Eddie Murphy play two men whose paths were never meant to cross. Aykroyd is the wealthy, fastidious Louis Winthorpe III, an ex­ecutive in one of Philadelphia's leading investment firms. Murphy plays Billy Ray Valentine, who has spent his life in the ghetto surviving on his wits. They find their positions reversed in a scheme set in motion by the greedy, conniving Duke brothers, founders of the Duke and Duke commodity brokerage firm where Winthorpe is a junior partner

programme.title: Abby
programme.desc: Ray begins court-ordered anger management after a family tragedy sparks a bar fight. Mickey, Bunchy and Daryll prepare for Terry and Maureen's wedding. Meanwhile, Sam Winslow, a powerful new employer, comes into Ray's life. Season premiere(c)

Hopes for a beautiful day are dashed at Terry and Maureen's wedding as tensions flare between the Donovans and the Dohertys(c)

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: The iron-willed comic book vigilante Frank Castle (a.k.a. "The Punisher") wages a one-man war on the New York mobsters that murdered his family in this action thriller starring Ray Stevenson, Dominic West and Julie Benz(n)

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: A notorious 1971 bank robbery in London is the basis for this exciting, suspenseful thriller starring Jason Statham as a car dealer who agrees to the dangerous heist in order to finance a new family but gets more than he bargains for when the break-in yields not just riches but a slew of valuable state secrets. Saffron Burrows costars in this exciting crime thriller from director Roger Donaldson(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Robert De Niro as career criminal Nick Wells, a safecracking specialist who allows himself to be pressured into one more heist by his flamboyant mentor (Marlon Brando) and a brilliant but impatient young thief (Edward Norton). Soon they're embroiled in a complex scheme to steal a priceless relic from a Canadian customs house, but revealed secrets and double-crosses are just around the corner(n)

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance(n)

programme.title: I Am Number Four
programme.desc: The new kid in town (Alex Pettyfer) is a nomad who discovers, when mysterious assassins track him down, that he's from a lot farther away than he ever knew. Dianna Agron and Timothy Olyphant costar in this sci-fi teen thriller(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: It's the 1860s, the Civil War is underway, and the country is torn apart and on the brink of chaos. For the inhabitants of Manhattan's Five Points, a war is also raging closer to home. Amsterdam Vallon (Leonardo Dicaprio), a young Irish-American immigrant, is released from prison after fifteen years. He returns to Five Points bent on revenge against Bill the Butcher (Daniel Day-Lewis), the powerful anti-immigrant gang leader who killed Amsterdam's father. Directed by Martin Scorsese(n)

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. He is given a special assignment and must root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency(n)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life(n)

programme.title: PART 17
programme.desc: The past dictates the future(n)

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: Grace (Nicole Kidman) has been raising her two young children alone in a beautiful, cavernous, Victorian mansion, the one place she believes them to be safe. But they are not safe. Not anymore. Her daughter reveals she has been communicating with unexplained apparitions. At first, Grace is reluctant to believe in her children's frightening sightings, but soon, she too begins to sense that intruders are at large. In order to discover the truth, Grace must abandon all of her fears, and enter the otherworldly heart of the supernatural

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars in this unusual psychological thriller as Earl Brooks, a doting husband and father, a successful businessman, and an award-winning philanthropist. Earl is beloved by his family and community, so nobody suspects that he is also a notorious, deranged serial killer who is under pressure from a zealously determined female detective (Demi Moore) and a sleazy photographer (Dane Cook) with evidence of his crimes. Marg Helgenberger and William Hurt costar

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley

programme.title: Attack of the Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: When a scientific experiment unleashes an epidemic of zombies in the Alps, a trio of snowboarders find themselves in a battle for survival where they must use their snowboarding skills to defeat the aprés-ski undead once and for all

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic

programme.title: Cold Souls
programme.desc: Paul Giamatti stars in this surreal comedy as an actor paralyzed by anxiety who decides to have his soul extracted by a high-tech company in order to alleviate his suffering but complications ensue when a mysterious soul-trafficking mule steals his soul and takes it to Russia

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: A classic comics character inspired this gritty, hard-boiled thriller about a slain cop (Gabriel Macht) whose ghost returns to his hometown to defeat a corrupt, murderous villain called The Octopus (Samuel L. Jackson). Eva Mendes costars in this visually dazzling adaptation

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: In this comic horror movie, two estranged brothers reunite at a birthday party in the woods but when the partygoers awaken an ancient demonic force, the brothers must find a way to put aside their differences in order to escape

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: In the final installment of the Evil Dead trilogy, Bruce Campbell returns as heroic Ash, the man with a chainsaw for a hand and a quip for every situation - no matter how bizarre that occasion might be

programme.title: Child's Play 2
programme.desc: Chucky's back in this sequel that picks up where the first one left off. Chucky's toy company rebuilds the doll in an attempt to prove that there is nothing wrong with it. Chucky then goes on a rampage, slicing and dicing with his unique brand of dark comedy, and horrifyingly escalating the violence over the original

programme.title: Child's Play 3
programme.desc: Third time's the charm for Chucky. Young Andy has grown up and attends a military school - too bad the killer doll still wants his soul. Thrills abound as Chucky stalks Andy relentlessly and murders with even more wit

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Horror comedy about a dutiful employee at a soul-crushing corporation who finds out that his new boss has promoted a vampire, who is destroying the office one body at a time

programme.title: Tekken 2: Kazuya's Revenge
programme.desc: While suffering from amnesia, Kazuya Mishima is kidnapped by an underground crime syndicate and forced to become a ruthless assassin. Awoken in the outskirts of Tekken city, Kazuya must traverse the unknown world to unravel the secrets and lies the city holds. Kazuya must solve the mysteries hidden behind his life

programme.title: Twelve Monkeys
programme.desc: The year is 2035 and humankind subsists in a desolate world following an event that eradicated 99 percent of the Earth's population, and made the planet's surface uninhabitable. In order to preserve their fate in this new world, survivors must rely on time travel as their last resort. Desperately hoping that the resources of the past might help them reclaim and rebuild the future, a group of scientists living beneath Philadelphia secure a volunteer to embark on an experimental trip back to the year 1996. Bruce Willis and Madeline Stowe star

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Something has gone wrong at a remote scientific research station on Mars. Sealing off the portal to Earth, Sarge (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson), Reaper (Karl Urban) and their team must use every weapon at their disposal—and some they find along the way—to carry out their orders: nothing gets out alive

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: In the final installment of the Evil Dead trilogy, Bruce Campbell returns as heroic Ash, the man with a chainsaw for a hand and a quip for every situation - no matter how bizarre that occasion might be

programme.title: Scar Tissue
programme.desc: A young man is stalked by a serial killer who supposedly died decades ago

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: A classic comics character inspired this gritty, hard-boiled thriller about a slain cop (Gabriel Macht) whose ghost returns to his hometown to defeat a corrupt, murderous villain called The Octopus (Samuel L. Jackson). Eva Mendes costars in this visually dazzling adaptation
